SENT.plain: A patient with neuro-Behcet disease is described
SPECT using Tc-99m HMPAO was performed to evaluate brain perfusion
The brain SPECT revealed decreased perfusion in the right frontal, parietal, temporal, and occipital lobes
MRI showed high intensity lesions in the white matter in the right periventricular centrum semiovale and frontal region on T2 weighted images
Gray matter abnormalities were evident on brain SPECT, but not on MRI
Brain SPECT using Tc-99m HMPAO may provide useful clinical information on regional cerebral cortical abnormalities associated with neuro-Behcet disease
